description: Delegate values engaging with academic institutions at the student or research level.
Delegate values spreading, growing or diversifying the Maker community.
Delegate values compliance and regulation where appropriate for MakerDAO.
Delegate values data availability and data-driven decision-making.
Delegate values decentralization of MakerDAO and the Maker Protocol.
Delegate values growth of MakerDAO and adoption of the Maker Protocol.
Delegate values innovation and creativity in problem-solving and direction.
Delegate values the expansion of the Maker Protocol onto other blockchains.
Delegate values pragmatic responses to problems facing MakerDAO.
Delegate values responsibility to all stakeholders that interact with MakerDAO and the Maker Protocol.
Delegate values increasing the revenue of the Maker Protocol and expanding to new revenue streams.
Delegate values appropriate management of risks for the Maker Protocol and MakerDAO.
Delegate values scalability of the Maker Protocol and MakerDAO.
Delegate values the security of the Maker Protocol when expanding and changing functionality.
Delegate values simplicity and comprehensibility when determining courses of action.
Delegate values social and environmental sustainability as a direction for MakerDAO.
Delegate values extending trust and confidence to individuals working for MakerDAO.
Delegate values providing leadership, direction and vision for MakerDAO.
Delegate values focus on long-term goals and helps align MakerDAO actors.
